author: Clare Hennig
title: COVID-19 can't stop the music: Balcony boogies for seniors, and a daughter serenades her ailing father
description: From trumpet-playing for dad, to a community dance-off at a seniors’ home, music is bringing people together during the time of COVID-19.
content:
From trumpet-playing for dad, to a community dance-off at a seniors' home, music is bringing people together during the time of COVID-19.
More than a dozen seniors at an independent living home in Vancouver's Kitsilano neighbourhood took to their balconies t… [+2816 chars]
